Source code for comet.cli.template_generator_nlg.nlg_generator

from typing import Text, Dict
from comet.domain.domain import Domain
from comet.domain.ontology import Ontology
from comet.utilities import constants
from comet.utilities.constants import DF_SYS_ACT
from applications.babe_sale_bot.utils.constants import SYS_ACT, USR_ACT
from comet.lib import write_json_beutifier
from comet.cli.template_generator_nlg import sys_sample_template as sys
from comet.cli.template_generator_nlg import usr_sample_template as usr
import click

PRJ_DIR = constants.WORKING_DIR



[docs]def add_end_attr(data: Dict):
    new_data = {}
    for s, v in data.items():
        if not s.endswith(";"):
            s += ";"
        new_data.update({s: v})
    return new_data



@click.group()
def nlg():
    pass


@nlg.command()
@click.option("--ontology_path", "ontology_path",
              help="The ontology file",
              default=f"{PRJ_DIR}/applications/babe_sale_bot/data/babe_ontology.json")
@click.option("--domain_path", "-d", "domain_path",
              help="The domain file",
              default=f"{PRJ_DIR}/applications/babe_sale_bot/data/babe_domain.json")
@click.option("--role", '-r', 'role',
              type=click.Choice(['usr', 'system']),
              help="nlg role",
              default="system")
@click.option("--mode", '-m', 'mode',
              type=click.Choice(['auto', 'manual']),
              help="mode to generate NL: supported [auto, manual]",
              default="auto")
@click.option("--out_path", '-o', 'out_path',
              help="Where to save output. (.json format)",
              show_default=True,
              default='./nlg_template.json')
def init_template_nlg(ontology_path: Text, domain_path: Text, role: Text, mode: Text,
                      out_path: Text = './nlg_template.json'):
    """
    Init NLG from domain

    Args:
        domain_path: The domain file
        ontology_path: The path of ontology
        role: usr or system
        mode: auto or manual
        out_path: output file

    Returns:

    """
    # print(mode)
    print('NLG UTILS', mode, out_path)
    domain = Domain.from_path(domain_path)
    ontology = Ontology.from_path(ontology_path)
    if role == constants.SYSTEM:
        act_set = domain.system_act_set
        attribute_inform_set = ontology.system_informable
        attribute_request_set = ontology.system_requestable
    else:
        act_set = domain.usr_act_set
        attribute_inform_set = ontology.usr_informable
        attribute_request_set = ontology.usr_requestable
    template = {}
    if mode == "auto" and role == constants.SYSTEM:
        for intent in act_set:
            if intent == constants.DF_USR_ACT.INFORM:
                template[intent] = get_possible_slot(attribute_inform_set, mode, DF_SYS_ACT.INFORM)
            elif intent == constants.DF_USR_ACT.REQUEST:
                template[intent] = add_end_attr(sys.request_data)
            elif intent == constants.DF_SYS_ACT.DENY:
                template[intent] = add_end_attr(sys.deny_data)
            elif intent == constants.DF_SYS_ACT.CONFIRM_ANSWER:
                template[intent] = get_possible_slot(attribute_inform_set, mode, False, 1)
            elif intent == constants.DF_SYS_ACT.ASK_CONFIRM:
                template[intent] = add_end_attr(sys.ask_confirm_data)
            elif intent == constants.DF_SYS_ACT.NOT_SURE:
                template[intent] = add_end_attr(sys.not_sure_data)
            elif intent == SYS_ACT.AGREE:
                template[intent] = add_end_attr(sys.agree_data)
            elif intent == SYS_ACT.WELCOME:
                template[intent] = {
                    "none;": [
                        "Chào mừng bạn ghé thăm shop gau và Bí Ngô, b cần mua sản phẩm gì ạ?"]}
            elif intent == SYS_ACT.I_AM_BOT:
                template[intent] = {
                    "none;": ["Mình là trợ lý ảo của shop Gấu và bí Ngô ạ"]}
            elif intent == SYS_ACT.CANT_HELP:
                template[intent] = {
                    "none;": ["Xin lỗi mình ko hiểu những gì bạn thông tin ạ"]}
            elif intent == SYS_ACT.BYE:
                template[intent] = {
                    "none;": ["Cám ơn bạn đạ ghé shop nhé",
                              "Bye nhé",
                              "bye"]}
            elif intent == SYS_ACT.THANK:
                template[intent] = {
                    "none;": ["Cám ơn bạn đạ ghé shop nhé",
                              "thanks b nhé",
                              "cám ơn b nhé"]}
            elif intent == SYS_ACT.GREET:
                template[intent] = {
                    "none;": [f"Chào bạn, mình là trợ lý ảo của shop Gấu và bí Ngô, "
                              f"mình có thể hổ trợ gì b ạ?"]}
            else:
                template[intent] = {"none;": []}
        template.update(sys.multi_intent_template)
    elif mode == 'auto' and role == constants.USER:
        for intent in act_set:
            if intent == USR_ACT.INFORM:
                template[intent] = get_possible_slot(attribute_inform_set, mode, DF_SYS_ACT.INFORM,
                                                     role=constants.USER)
            elif intent == USR_ACT.REQUEST:
                template[intent] = add_end_attr(usr.usr_request_data)
            elif intent == USR_ACT.DENY:
                template[intent] = add_end_attr(usr.usr_deny_data)
            elif intent == USR_ACT.ASK_CONFIRM:
                template[intent] = add_end_attr(usr.usr_ask_confirm_data)
            elif intent == USR_ACT.AGREE:
                template[intent] = add_end_attr(usr.usr_agree_data)
            elif intent == USR_ACT.GREET:
                template[intent] = {
                    "none;": [
                        "Hello shop!",
                        "Shop oi",
                        "Hi shop"
                    ]}
            elif intent == USR_ACT.ASK_IS_BOT:
                template[intent] = {
                    "none;": [
                        "Bạn là bot hả",
                        'bot ha?']}
            elif intent == USR_ACT.FALLBACK:
                template[intent] = {
                    "none;": ['']}
            elif intent == USR_ACT.BYE:
                template[intent] = {
                    "none;": ["Bye shop nhé",
                              "Bye nhé",
                              "bye"]}
            elif intent == USR_ACT.THANK:
                template[intent] = {
                    "none;": ["Cám ơn shop nhe",
                              "thanks shop nhé"]}
            else:
                template[intent] = {"none;": []}
    else:
        raise NotImplemented
    write_json_beutifier(out_path, template)
    print(f"Generate tempalate done!!")



[docs]def get_possible_slot(attribute_set, mode, with_template=None, step=3, role=constants.SYSTEM):
    """
    Get all possible slot keys for template

    Args:
        attribute_set:
        mode:
        role:
        with_template: inform, request
        step:

    Returns:

    """
    data = {}
    attribute_set = list(sorted(attribute_set))
    module = usr if role == constants.USER else sys
    if mode == "auto":
        # 1 slot
        for s1 in attribute_set:
            if step < 1: break
            s = s1 + ";"
            if with_template == DF_SYS_ACT.INFORM:
                data[s] = module.gen_template_inform_sentence([s1])
            elif with_template == DF_SYS_ACT.REQUEST:
                data[s] = module.gen_template_request_sentence([s1])
            elif with_template == DF_SYS_ACT.ASK_CONFIRM:
                data[s] = module.gen_template_ask_confirm_sentence([s1])
            elif with_template == DF_SYS_ACT.DENY:
                data[s] = module.gen_template_deny_sentence([s1])
                data["none"] = module.gen_template_deny_sentence(["none"])
            elif with_template == DF_SYS_ACT.NOT_SURE:
                data[s] = module.gen_template_not_sure_sentence([s1])
                data["none"] = module.gen_template_not_sure_sentence(["none"])
            # elif with_template == DF_SYS_ACT.NOT_SURE_CONFIRM:
            #     data[s] = gen_template_not_sure_confirm_sentence([s1])
            else:
                data[s] = []

        # 2 slot
        for idx1 in range(len(attribute_set)):
            for idx2 in range(idx1 + 1, len(attribute_set)):
                if step < 2:
                    break
                s1 = attribute_set[idx1]
                s2 = attribute_set[idx2]
                s = ';'.join([s1, s2]) + ";"
                if with_template == DF_SYS_ACT.INFORM:
                    data[s] = module.gen_template_inform_sentence([s1, s2])
                elif with_template == DF_SYS_ACT.REQUEST:
                    data[s] = module.gen_template_request_sentence([s1, s2])
                elif with_template == DF_SYS_ACT.ASK_CONFIRM:
                    data[s] = module.gen_template_ask_confirm_sentence([s1, s2])
                elif with_template == DF_SYS_ACT.DENY:
                    data[s] = module.gen_template_deny_sentence([s1, s2])
                elif with_template == DF_SYS_ACT.NOT_SURE:
                    data[s] = module.gen_template_not_sure_sentence([s1, s2])
                else:
                    data[s] = []
        # 3 slot
        for idx1 in range(len(attribute_set)):
            if step < 3:
                break
            for idx2 in range(idx1 + 1, len(attribute_set)):
                for idx3 in range(idx2 + 1, len(attribute_set)):
                    s1 = attribute_set[idx1]
                    s2 = attribute_set[idx2]
                    s3 = attribute_set[idx3]
                    s = ";".join([s1, s2, s3])
                    if with_template == DF_SYS_ACT.INFORM:
                        data[s] = module.gen_template_inform_sentence([s1, s2, s3])
                    elif with_template == DF_SYS_ACT.REQUEST:
                        data[s] = module.gen_template_request_sentence([s1, s2, s3])
                    elif with_template == DF_SYS_ACT.ASK_CONFIRM:
                        data[s] = module.gen_template_ask_confirm_sentence([s1, s2, s3])
                    elif with_template == DF_SYS_ACT.DENY:
                        data[s] = module.gen_template_deny_sentence([s1, s2, s3])
                    elif with_template == DF_SYS_ACT.NOT_SURE:
                        data[s] = module.gen_template_not_sure_sentence([s1, s2, s3])
                    else:
                        data[s] = []
    else:
        raise NotImplementedError
    return data
